description:
## Objective 
Add confirmation dialog in forgot passcode 

## Description
When the user taps forgot passcode, he's directly directed to the login page without a confirmation dialog. The task here is to add the confirmation dialog.

More details can be found on the following issue page  on GitHub:
https://github.com/openMF/mifos-mobile-cn/issues/86

## How to get help
If you need help, be sure to post your question to our [developer mailing list](http://mifos.org/resources/community/communications/#mailing-lists) or  ask in our [chatroom](https://gitter.im/openMF/mifos).
name: mifos-mobile-cn: add confirmation dialog in forgot passcode
